data.title: Support Dizzy to Disrupt A Site Push
data.description: Use this Dizzy to safely disrupt the Attacker's push into A Site / break up their push into Site.

data.title: Early Round A Dish Push with Dizzy + Your Team
data.description: Use this to take control of A Dish at the very start of the round with 1 or more teammates.

data.title: Safely Defend B Site From Generator
data.description: This is a great way to safely defend B Site from Generator, giving your team time to rotate and get into position to retake B Site, while also breaking up the enemy team's push into Site.

data.title: Safe Early Round Support Dizzies for B Bench / A Main Push
